res.word: #Khudavang monastery is one of the best testimonies of ancient Caucasian Albania civilization

res.word: Built in 9-13th century by wife of Albanian prince Vakhtang in Kalbajar region of #Azerbaijan,this complex is composed of Church of Arzu Khatun,Church of Hasan, basilica and 2 chapels pic
